text: denʹ prybude koly tsey khto disbelieved bude vvodytysya do hellfire: "Vy vytratyly harni mozhlyvosti dani vam pid chas vashoho svitovo dovichnym, ta vy tishylysya z nykh. Otzhe, sʹohodni vy zaznayete hanebnoho retribution yak requital dlya zukhvalosti vy zdiysnyly na zemli bez budʹ-yakoyi bazy, ta dlya vashoho zla pratsi
